SELECT * FROM (SELECT result2.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT result1.*, name, al.num, imagePath, title, writer, viewCount, al.regdate FROM (SELECT a.num AS likeNum, COUNT(l.num) AS cnt FROM board_adopt a LEFT OUTER JOIN adoptlike l ON a.num = l.num WHERE liked = 'yes' GROUP BY a.num) result1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN board_adopt al ON likeNum = al.num INNER JOIN shelter s ON writer = s.id
ORDER BY al.num DESC) result2) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result2.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT result1.*, name, al.num, imagePath, title, writer, viewCount, al.regdate FROM (SELECT a.num AS likeNum, id, liked FROM board_adopt a LEFT OUTER JOIN adoptlike l ON a.num = l.num WHERE id = #{id} ) result1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN board_adopt al ON likeNum = al.num INNER JOIN shelter s ON writer = s.id
ORDER BY al.num DESC) result2) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM board_adopt INNER JOIN shelter ON writer = id

SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, name, title, viewCount, writer, breed, petName, petAge, petGender, vaccination, neutralization, findDate, caption, orgImageName, imagePath, a.regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_adopt a INNER JOIN shelter ON writer = id
) WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_adopt (num, title, writer, breed, petName, petAge, petGender, vaccination, neutralization, findDate, caption, orgImageName, imagePath, regdate) VALUES(board_adopt_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{breed}, #{petName}, #{petAge}, #{petGender}, #{vaccination}, #{neutralization}, #{findDate}, #{caption}, #{orgImageName}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE)
